title: Fact Checking - Perplexity

openaiSpec.name: factCheckViaPerplexity
openaiSpec.description: Fact check claims using Perplexity's internet search capabilities. Returns analysis and citations for verification.

claim.description: The claim to be fact checked

claim_number.description: The position of this claim in the list (1-based)

total_claims.description: Total number of claims to be checked

userSettings.name: apiKey
userSettings.label: Perplexity API Key
userSettings.description: Get your API Key from Perplexity: https://www.perplexity.ai/settings/api

userSettings.name: systemMessage
userSettings.label: System Message
userSettings.description: Optional; Enter custom system message to guide fact checking behavior.
userSettings.defaultValue: You are a fact checker. Analyze the claim carefully and determine if it is true, false, or partially true. Provide reason for determination and citations.
userSettings.placeholder: Default: 'Analyze the claim carefully and determine if it is true, false, or partially true. Provide reason for determination and citations.'
